entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.7°C

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2 except 8 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h. High plus 2 except 8 near the Trans-Canada Highway. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High zero except 8 near the Trans-Canada Highway. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon with risk of freezing rain. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High zero except 8 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 13 January 2023
